titleStmt.title: Rest for the vveary, or A briefe treatise tending to the comfort of a poore soule trulie humbled for sin. By Archibald Symmer, Aberdonen, minister of the Gospell.
titleStmt.author: Symmer, Archibald.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. N[orton] for William Sheres. at the South doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
